nodes.excerpt: BackgroundCut is the fastest & easiest way to remove or replace any image's background. It uses Artificial Intelligence to analyze and cut out any image's background with a single click. Just upload your image and remove the background in under 5 seconds!
nodes.title: BackgroundCut - Remove image background automatically with AI
nodes.author: HARSH RANJAN

nodes.excerpt: Verifying user identities requires writing tedious, repetitive code, risking catastrophic security breaches ğŸ˜±. With NoPass.me, an open-source MFA verification solution, securely send and verify One-Time Passwords and ensure users are who they say they are!

nodes.excerpt: Generate a REST API with read + write endpoints on top of a sample dataset in less than 30 secs. Customize your dataset with dozens of datatypes. Built for testing, BI demo data, prototypes and more.
nodes.title: Mock API Generator - Generate custom data & API to build apps in less than 30s
nodes.author: Jamie Cuffe

nodes.excerpt: Backprop is an API/platform that makes enhancing software with machine learning simple. With powerful out-of-the-box models, easy custom uploads, scalable infrastructure, and an affordable pricing scheme, Backprop has everything you need.
nodes.title: Backprop - Serverless machine learning API for every developer

nodes.excerpt: Analyze reviews with enriched company profiles from 85+ review sites in one place.
nodes.title: Datashake - Turning scraped data into intelligent data

nodes.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
nodes.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes
nodes.author: Brandon Foo

nodes.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate property investment analysis tool which helps you find the best investment opportunities nearby.
nodes.title: DataMool - Global predictive residential property investment analysis

nodes.excerpt: Streamâ€™s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
nodes.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API

nodes.excerpt: Stackby is a collaborative workspace that brings ease of use of spreadsheets, functionality of databases and access to popular services via no-code API connectors - to create, organize and automate anything.
nodes.title: Stackby - Spreadsheet, databases, and no-code APIs in one platform
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Coupler.io synchronizes data between Airtable, Clockify, Shopify, Trello, etc., and Google Sheets allowing you to bring data into a single place and customize your reporting. Try Coupler.io Free-forever plan now and auto-import up to 50K rows per month!
nodes.title: Coupler.io - Pull data from apps on a schedule with no coding required

nodes.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
nodes.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free

nodes.excerpt: This API enables you to scrape any data from any website, without worrying about proxies, CAPTCHAs, headless browsers and many other complexities involved in web scraping. We make sure you never get blocked again!
nodes.title: Web Scraper API - Scrape the web at scale without getting blocked

nodes.title: WeWeb - No-code site builder that integrates with the tools you love
